answers.answer: Without a thorough examination by a medical doctor there are a number of possibilities which can cause diabetes skin problems. Because you didn't explain the color or what "dark disscoloration on lower limbs" meant here are a few conditions.● Atherosclerosis - thinning of the arteries● Diabetic dermopathy - poor blood supply to skin● Bacterial and/or fungal infection● Onset of gangrene● Diabetic neuropathy - left untreated leads to amputationPlease call your doctor for an evaluation before your condition worsens.

question: I have diabetes 1 what causes dark disscoloration on lower limbs?
title: diabetes
